price: 31. Allaah baana iska leh waxaa ku sugan samooyinka iyo waxa ku sugan arlada, si uu uga abaal marsho kuwa fala xumaanta waxay falaan, iyo (inuu) ugu abaal gudo kuwa fala samaanta samaan (Janno).
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَٰٓـُٔواْ بِمَا عَمِلُواْ وَيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَى

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi liyajziya alladhīna asāū bimā ʿamilū wayajziya alladhīna aḥsanū bil-ḥus'nā
